titleStmt.title: A proper nevv ballad, entituled, The Granadeers rant. To its own proper new tune, Hy the brave Granadeers, ho.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Captain Hume is bound to sea ..."
Cf. Wing P3668 which has "grenadiers" in the title.
Imperfect: mutilated and stained affecting legibility.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
